name: Faunwood Meadow - A3 CinDes
description:
Description

Explore a  simple scenic forest scene with five creature inhabitants to photograph. Inspired by illustrator Miranda Zimmerman's Faunwood collection of artworks.

For the best experience I recommend playing in full screen.

Controls

Move Mouse to look

Left click to Zoom In

Right click to Zoom Out

Space Bar to take Photos

Made in Unity and Blender. All assets original by me.
